title: Chile Paste
meta: Freeze for 1 year. Use 2 TBSP in place of 1 TBSP chili powder.
ingredients: 3 new mexico red, california costeño, or choricero chilies

directions.text: Seed and tear all chilies into roughly 1″ pieces.
Toast chiles in a dutch oven over medium-high heat stirring for 4 mins.
Add stock and simmer for 7 mins.
